title: What Time Does Outlander Season 7 Part 2 Release on Starz? Schedule Explained
description: Outlander S7 Part 2 airs soon, on Starz. Catch the weekly episodes and stream options. Get ready for more drama! The post What Time Does Outlander Season 7 Part 2 Release on Starz? Schedule Explained appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Fans of the hit TV show are curious when will Outlander Season 7 Part 2 comes out and its release time date along with its schedule on Starz.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Have the creators announced the release time and date for Outlander Season 7 Part 2 on Starz? In the first part, we saw Jamie racing to save Claire from the gallows amid the American Revolution in North Carolina. Fans eagerly anticipate Part 2, wondering how many episodes remain and actively searching for streaming options. Without further ado, let’s dive into the latest release schedule and time for Outlander Season 7 Part 2. When does Outlander Season 7 Part 2 come out on Starz? The MGM+ hit series Outlander Season 7 Part 2 is set to premiere its first episode on Friday, November 22, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. EST, 7:00 p.m. CT, and 5:00 p.m. PT. Fans can watch it on Starz, its streaming app, or Hulu with a Starz add-on. For streaming, new episodes will be available starting at midnight on their respective release dates via the Starz app. The second half of Season 7 will feature the remaining eight episodes (episodes 9–16), premiering weekly on Fridays. These episodes will primarily adapt Diana Gabaldon’s seventh book, An Echo in the Bone, with elements from her ninth book, Written in My Own Heart’s Blood. Outlander Season 7 Part 2’s entire release schedule Mark your calendars! Here’s the full release schedule for Outlander Season 7 Part 2: Episode 9: Unfinished Business – Airs November 22, 2024 Episode 10: Brotherly Love – Airs November 29, 2024 Episode 11: A Hundredweight of Stone – Airs December 6, 2024 Episode 12: Carnal Knowledge – Airs December 13, 2024 Episode 13: Hello, Goodbye – Airs December 20, 2024 Episode 14: Ye Dinna Get Used to It – Airs December 27, 2024 Episode 15: Written in My Own Heart’s Blood – Airs January 3, 2025 Episode 16: A Hundred Thousand Angels – Airs January 10, 2025 In Outlander Season 7 Part 1, we witnessed a pivotal moment as Jamie Fraser almost shot his son William during a fierce battle, unknowingly returning his hat afterward, unaware of their familial bond. Meanwhile, Roger and Brianna, in the 1980s, discovered their son Jemmy missing, prompting Roger and William Buchleigh MacKenzie to travel through the stones in search of him. Catch up on all episodes of Outlander Seasons 1–7 Part 1, and soon Part 2, streaming exclusively on MGM+, Starz, and Hulu.
html:
Have the creators announced the release time and date for Outlander Season 7 Part 2 on Starz? In the first part, we saw Jamie racing to save Claire from the gallows amid the American Revolution in North Carolina. Fans eagerly anticipate Part 2, wondering how many episodes remain and actively searching for streaming options.

Without further ado, let’s dive into the latest release schedule and time for Outlander Season 7 Part 2.

When does Outlander Season 7 Part 2 come out on Starz?

The MGM+ hit series Outlander Season 7 Part 2 is set to premiere its first episode on Friday, November 22, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. EST, 7:00 p.m. CT, and 5:00 p.m. PT.

Fans can watch it on Starz, its streaming app, or Hulu with a Starz add-on. For streaming, new episodes will be available starting at midnight on their respective release dates via the Starz app. The second half of Season 7 will feature the remaining eight episodes (episodes 9–16), premiering weekly on Fridays. These episodes will primarily adapt Diana Gabaldon’s seventh book, An Echo in the Bone, with elements from her ninth book, Written in My Own Heart’s Blood.

Outlander Season 7 Part 2’s entire release schedule

Mark your calendars! Here’s the full release schedule for Outlander Season 7 Part 2:

  • Episode 9: Unfinished Business – Airs November 22, 2024
  • Episode 10: Brotherly Love – Airs November 29, 2024
  • Episode 11: A Hundredweight of Stone – Airs December 6, 2024
  • Episode 12: Carnal Knowledge – Airs December 13, 2024
  • Episode 13: Hello, Goodbye – Airs December 20, 2024
  • Episode 14: Ye Dinna Get Used to It – Airs December 27, 2024
  • Episode 15: Written in My Own Heart’s Blood – Airs January 3, 2025
  • Episode 16: A Hundred Thousand Angels – Airs January 10, 2025

In Outlander Season 7 Part 1, we witnessed a pivotal moment as Jamie Fraser almost shot his son William during a fierce battle, unknowingly returning his hat afterward, unaware of their familial bond. Meanwhile, Roger and Brianna, in the 1980s, discovered their son Jemmy missing, prompting Roger and William Buchleigh MacKenzie to travel through the stones in search of him.

Catch up on all episodes of Outlander Seasons 1–7 Part 1, and soon Part 2, streaming exclusively on MGM+, Starz, and Hulu.
